fixed_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 57.0/59.8/62.7% of Attack. 31.7/33.3/34.9% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Mazionga

innate_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 114.0/119.7/125.4% of Attack. 63.3/66.5/69.6% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Zionga

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 58.2/61.1/64.0% of Attack (2 hits).
innate_skill.name: Double Fangs

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Defense by 9.1% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Maraku II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 5.2%. When dealing Electric damage, increase critical damage by 37.5%.
passive_skill.name: Thunder's Judgment

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 5.2%. When dealing Electric damage, increase critical damage by 43%.
passive_skill.name: Thunder's Judgment I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
